016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.log4jpublisher.log4j;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.concurrent.NamedThreadFactory;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.disruptor.handlers.UnicastEventHandler;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.log4jpublisher.LoggingMetadataEventHandler;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.reactivestreams.api.WithMetadata;
024import com.lmax.disruptor.BlockingWaitStrategy;
025import com.lmax.disruptor.TimeoutException;
026import com.lmax.disruptor.dsl.Disruptor;
027import com.lmax.disruptor.dsl.ProducerType;
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.ThreadContext;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Appender;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Filter;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.Layout;
032import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LogEvent;
033import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.AbstractAppender;
034import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.appender.AbstractOutputStreamAppender;
035import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.Node;
036import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.Property;
037import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.Plugin;
038import org.apache.logging.log4j.core.config.plugins.PluginBuilderFactory;
039
040import java.io.Serializable;
041import java.util.Objects;
042import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
043
044/**
045 * @author rickardoberg
046 * @since 13/04/2022
047 */
048
049@Plugin(name = "Log4jPublisher", category = Node.CATEGORY, elementType = Appender.ELEMENT_TYPE, printObject = true)
050public class Log4jPublisherAppender
051        extends AbstractAppender {
052
053    public static class Builder<B extends Log4jPublisherAppender.Builder<B>> extends AbstractOutputStreamAppender.Builder<B>
054            implements org.apache.logging.log4j.core.util.Builder<Log4jPublisherAppender> {
055        @Override
056        public Log4jPublisherAppender build() {
057            final Layout<? extends Serializable> layout = getOrCreateLayout();
058
059            return new Log4jPublisherAppender(getName(), layout, getFilter(), isIgnoreExceptions(), getPropertyArray());
060        }
061    }
062
063    @PluginBuilderFactory
064    public static <B extends Log4jPublisherAppender.Builder<B>> B newBuilder() {
065        return new Log4jPublisherAppender.Builder<B>().asBuilder();
066    }
067
068    private final Disruptor<WithMetadata<LogEvent>> disruptor;
069    private final LoggingMetadataEventHandler loggingMetadataEventHandler = new LoggingMetadataEventHandler();
070    private final UnicastEventHandler<WithMetadata<LogEvent>> unicastEventHandler = new UnicastEventHandler<>();
071
072    public Log4jPublisherAppender(final String name, final Layout<? extends Serializable> layout, final Filter filter,
073                                  final boolean ignoreExceptions, final Property[] properties) {
074        super(name, filter, layout, ignoreExceptions, properties);
075        Objects.requireNonNull(layout, "layout");
076
077        disruptor = new Disruptor<>(WithMetadata::new, 4096, new NamedThreadFactory("Log4jDisruptor-"),
078                ProducerType.MULTI,
079                new BlockingWaitStrategy());
080        disruptor.handleEventsWith(loggingMetadataEventHandler)
081                .then(unicastEventHandler);
082    }
083
084    @Override
085    public void append(final LogEvent event) {
086
087        if (event.getContextData().containsKey("log4jsubscriber"))
088        {
089            return;
090        }
091
092        disruptor.publishEvent((holder, seq, e) ->
093        {
094            Metadata.Builder builder = new Metadata.Builder();
095            builder.add("timestamp", System.currentTimeMillis());
096            ThreadContext.getContext().forEach(builder::add);
097            holder.set(builder.build(), e);
098        }, event);
099    }
100
101    @Override
102    public void start() {
103        disruptor.start();
104        super.start();
105    }
106
107    @Override
108    public boolean stop(final long timeout, final TimeUnit timeUnit) {
109
110        try {
111            disruptor.shutdown(timeout, timeUnit);
112        } catch (TimeoutException e) {
113            // Ignore
114        }
115        return super.stop(timeout, timeUnit);
116    }
117
118    public UnicastEventHandler<WithMetadata<LogEvent>> getUnicastEventHandler() {
119        return unicastEventHandler;
120    }
121
122    public void setConfiguration(Configuration configuration) {
123        loggingMetadataEventHandler.configuration.set(configuration);
124    }
125
126    @Override
127    public String toString() {
128        return "DisruptorAppender{" +
129                "name=" + getName() +
130                ", state=" + getState() +
131                '}';
132    }
133}
